GapFillDragDrop.Title: Wordspot: make
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Choose an answer and drag it to the correct space.

Content.Question:
1. The company has made a profit this year.
2. Is your bag made of leather?
3. It took Khandi ages to make up his mind.
4. We’re hungry. Can you make us something to eat?
5. Sean has made an arrangement to meet Paolo at three o’clock.
6. Sometimes Chris makes me very angry.
7. Don’t touch your eye! You’ll make it worse.
8. My watch was made in Switzerland.
9. I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Williams, please.
10. Sonia, you ’ve made a terrible mess in here!
11. My teacher tried to make it clear but I still didn’t understand.
12. I’m sorry, I think I ’ve made a mistake.
